(42563, 45493).name: Iran

(42563, 45493).name: SPEI
(42563, 45493).label: instrument

(42563, 45493).name: Penman-Monteith method
(42563, 45493).label: instrument
(42563, 45493).description: A technique for estimating potential evapotranspiration, which is essential for understanding water balance and drought dynamics

(42563, 45493).name: potential evapotranspiration
(42563, 45493).label: variable
(42563, 45493).description: The amount of water that would be lost through evaporation and plant transpiration if the soil were fully saturated and vegetation were fully grown

(42563, 45493).name: water resources
(42563, 45493).label: variable

(42563, 45493).name: drought severity
